sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INSR4300 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , ANTY_DEIN_YR , HAN_NM , RESN_REGN_NUM , ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS , ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT , ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , ANTY_MNTH_PRMM , BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN , PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN , ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #emymtSeilNum# , #antyDeinYr# , #hanNm# , Replace(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') , #antyTotDutyNumDys# , #antyIncmTotAmnt# , #antyStdIncmMnthAmnt# , #antyMnthPrmm# , #bfrStdIncmMnthAmnt# , #txtnDataDeinYn# , #pbcorpOautyDeinYn# , #antyPayRflctnYn# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )

INSERT INTO INSR4300 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , ANTY_DEIN_YR , HAN_NM , RESN_REGN_NUM , ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS , ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT , ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , ANTY_MNTH_PRMM , BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN , PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN , ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN , NAT_PENN_AQTN_DT , NAT_APPTN_YR_MNTH , NAT_PRCS_DT , NAT_PRCS_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , NVL((SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM = Replace(#resnRegnNum#,'-','')),( 'P' || LPAD((SELECT NVL(MAX(EMYMT_SEIL_NUM),0) + 1 FROM INSR4300),7,'0'))) , (SELECT MAX(EMYMT_SEIL_NUM) AS EMYMT_SEIL_NUM FROM INSR3000 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY= ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') ) ) , #antyDeinYr# , #hanNm# , Replace(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') , #antyTotDutyNumDys# , #antyIncmTotAmnt# , #antyStdIncmMnthAmnt# , #antyMnthPrmm# , #bfrStdIncmMnthAmnt# , #txtnDataDeinYn# , #pbcorpOautyDeinYn# , #antyPayRflctnYn# , (SELECT MAX(NAT_PENN_AQTN_DT) FROM INSR4100 WHERE SYSTEMKEY = (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM = Replace(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') ) AND DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# ) , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM') , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , #natPrcsYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INSR4300 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# , ANTY_DEIN_YR=#antyDeinYr# , HAN_NM=#hanNm# , RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# , ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS=#antyTotDutyNumDys# , ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT=#antyIncmTotAmnt# , ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT=#antyStdIncmMnthAmnt# , ANTY_MNTH_PRMM=#antyMnthPrmm# , BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT=#bfrStdIncmMnthAmnt# , TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN=#txtnDataDeinYn# , PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN=#pbcorpOautyDeinYn# , ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN=#antyPayRflctnYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND ANTY_DEIN_YR=#antyDeinYr#

UPDATE INSR4300 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# , ANTY_DEIN_YR=#antyDeinYr# , HAN_NM=#hanNm# , RESN_REGN_NUM=#resnRegnNum# , ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS=#antyTotDutyNumDys# , ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT=#antyIncmTotAmnt# , ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT=#antyStdIncmMnthAmnt# , ANTY_MNTH_PRMM=#antyMnthPrmm# , BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT=#bfrStdIncmMnthAmnt# , TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN=#txtnDataDeinYn# , PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN=#pbcorpOautyDeinYn# , ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN=#antyPayRflctnYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY= (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM = Replace(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') ) AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND ANTY_DEIN_YR=#antyDeinYr#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM INSR4300 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND ANTY_DEIN_YR=#antyDeinYr#
DELETE FROM INSR4300 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND ANTY_DEIN_YR=#antyDeinYr# AND SYSTEMKEY= (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM = Replace(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') )
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , ANTY_DEIN_YR , HAN_NM , RESN_REGN_NUM , ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS , ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT , ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , ANTY_MNTH_PRMM , BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN , PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN , ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR4300 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# AND ANTY_DEIN_YR=#antyDeinYr#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , ANTY_DEIN_YR , HAN_NM , RESN_REGN_NUM , ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS , ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT , ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , ANTY_MNTH_PRMM , BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN , PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN , ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR4300 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM DESC , ANTY_DEIN_YR DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM INSR4300 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , AA.ANTY_DEIN_YR , AA.HAN_NM , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM , AA.ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS , AA.ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT , AA.ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , AA.ANTY_MNTH_PRMM , AA.BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , AA.TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN , AA.PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN , AA.ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN , BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , BB.BUSIN_CD , fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4),BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM FROM INSR4300 AA, PSNL0100 BB, PAYR0500 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY
BB.DEPT_CD=#mangeDeptCd#
BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.ANTY_DEIN_YR = #antyDeinYr#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangeDeptCd#
BB.HDOFC_CODTN_CD
#hdofcCodtnCdArr[]#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4) =#businApptnYr#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD ASC ,(SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD) ASC , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM ASC , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , AA.ANTY_DEIN_YR , AA.HAN_NM , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM , AA.ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS , AA.ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT , AA.ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , AA.ANTY_MNTH_PRMM , AA.BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , AA.TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN , AA.PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN , AA.ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN , BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , BB.BUSIN_CD , fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4),BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM FROM INSR4300 AA, PSNL0100 BB, PAYR0500 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY
BB.DEPT_CD=#mangeDeptCd#
BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.ANTY_DEIN_YR = #antyDeinYr#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangeDeptCd#
BB.HDOFC_CODTN_CD
#hdofcCodtnCdArr[]#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4) =#businApptnYr#
)

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , AA.ANTY_DEIN_YR , AA.HAN_NM , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM , AA.ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS , AA.ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT , AA.ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , AA.ANTY_MNTH_PRMM , AA.BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , AA.TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN , AA.PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN , AA.ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN , BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD , fcBassEx0350CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'1' ) AS DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_NM , BB.BUSIN_CD , fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4),BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM FROM INSR4300 AA, PSNL0100 BB, PAYR0500 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY
BB.DEPT_CD=#mangeDeptCd#
BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.ANTY_DEIN_YR = #antyDeinYr#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' )) ) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangeDeptCd#
BB.HDOFC_CODTN_CD
#hdofcCodtnCdArr[]#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4) =#businApptnYr#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD ASC ,(SELECT LPAD(DEPT_RANK,5,'0') FROM BASS0400 DD WHERE DD.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND DD.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD) ASC , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM ASC , BB.DTIL_OCCU_CLS_DIV_CD ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , AA.ANTY_DEIN_YR , AA.HAN_NM , AA.RESN_REGN_NUM , AA.ANTY_TOT_DUTY_NUM_DYS , AA.ANTY_INCM_TOT_AMNT , AA.ANTY_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , AA.ANTY_MNTH_PRMM , AA.BFR_STD_INCM_MNTH_AMNT , AA.TXTN_DATA_DEIN_YN , AA.PBCORP_OAUTY_DEIN_YN , AA.ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN , BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD , fcBass0300CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM , BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD , fcBass0400CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS DEPT_NM , BB.TYP_OCCU_CD , fcBass0320CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM , BB.PYSP_GRDE_CD , BB.BUSIN_CD , fcBass0500CDNM(BB.DPOB_CD,SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4),BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,BB.BUSIN_CD) AS BUSIN_NM FROM INSR4300 AA, PSNL0100 BB, PAYR0500 CC WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD = CC.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = CC.SYSTEMKEY
BB.DEPT_CD=#mangeDeptCd#
BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD=#repbtyBusinDivCd#
AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
AA.ANTY_DEIN_YR = #antyDeinYr#
AND EXISTS ( SELECT C.DPOB_CD, C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD, C.TYP_OCCU_CD, C.DEPT_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM TABLE(PKG_DTIL_AUTH.FN_DTIL_AUTH_TB(#dpobCd#,#payrMangDeptYn#,#payrMangDeptCd#,#deptCd#,#usrId#,#deptCdAuth#,'' ))) C WHERE C.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND C.DEPT_CD = BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD AND NVL(C.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.TYP_OCCU_CD,'TT') AND NVL(C.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT') = NVL(BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD,'TT')
C.DEPT_CD
#deptCdArr[]#
)
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD
#typOccuCdArr[]#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD
#dtilOccuInttnCdArr[]#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
CC.PAYR_MANG_DEPT_CD=#payrMangeDeptCd#
BB.HDOFC_CODTN_CD
#hdofcCodtnCdArr[]#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
SUBSTR(BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT,1,4) =#businApptnYr#
)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INSR4300 SET NAT_APPTN_YR_MNTH = #natApptnYrMnth# , NAT_PRCS_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') , NAT_PRCS_YN = #natPrcsYn# , ANTY_PAY_RFLCTN_YN=#antyPayRflctnYn# , ISMT = #ismt# , REVN_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR = #revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM = #emymtSeilNum# AND ANTY_DEIN_YR = #antyDeinYr#
sqlMap.select: SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM INSR4100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY= ( SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM = REPLACE(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') )
